life is fiction competition and contradiction petty perceptions window dressing for misdirection love is a lotto i know i know you know what i know hope is so hollow thats why winos follow the bottle and people pressure make death a hidden treasure a guilty pleasure lonely language inside a letter its now or never move it move it love it or lose it fore its recruited then included in something stupid its things of nature paid a player and say your prayers naysayers the haters the major players the beggars you bout it bout it dont allow it to pow without it then those who doubt it doomed to die the death of cowards the world is yours and the world we cant afford so ignore the law; start a fire then start a war if youre sick and tired of your access denied free will died long before blogs and ipod
